Items.Title: Oversight - Lower Manhattan Infrastructure Needs – Planning for Growth: Schools and Healthcare Services
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Lower Manhattan Infrastructure Needs – Planning for Growth: Schools and Healthcare Services

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Environmental Protection Agency to abandon its technically and scientifically flawed 2005 Test and Clean Program, and work with the residents and workers, community and labor organizations and elected officials to design and implement an effective, science-based sampling and cleanup program for residences and workplaces in all affected areas.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Environmental Protection Agency to abandon its technically and scientifically flawed 2005 Test and Clean Program.
